title: Manifesting in 2022
itunes:title: Manifesting in 2022
description:
The Breakfast Club is back from break, and ready to speak on all things that they missed. Moreover, they opened the phone lines based off of a comment from one of our listeners in our segment "Get It Off Your Chest" where he spoke on him not going to his daughters wedding because he does not get to walk down the aisle with her at her wedding. Also, they opened the phone lines to see what our listeners are trying to manifest in the new year. And for Charlamagne's first "Donkey of the Day" for the new year, he gives it to Chadwick Moore, who spoke on Tucker Carlson about the increase in vasectomies, and calls it a liberal trend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
The Breakfast Club is back from break, and ready to speak on all things that they missed. Moreover, they opened the phone lines based off of a comment from one of our listeners in our segment "Get It Off Your Chest" where he spoke on him not going to his daughters wedding because he does not get to walk down the aisle with her at her wedding. Also, they opened the phone lines to see what our listeners are trying to manifest in the new year. And for Charlamagne's first "Donkey of the Day" for the new year, he gives it to Chadwick Moore, who spoke on Tucker Carlson about the increase in vasectomies, and calls it a liberal trend.
